H0.text: What merchant bank collapsed in 1995 due to unauthorised debts accumulated by trader Nick Leeson. Morgan Stanley

H1.text: What merchant bank collapsed in 1995 due to unauthorised debts accumulated by trader Nick Leeson. Goldman Sachs

H2.text: What merchant bank collapsed in 1995 due to unauthorised debts accumulated by trader Nick Leeson. Lehman Brothers

H3.text: What merchant bank collapsed in 1995 due to unauthorised debts accumulated by trader Nick Leeson. Barings

A4.text: In 1995, Barings Bank, the oldest investment bank in Britain, collapsed as a result of unauthorised trading by its head derivatives trader in Singapore, Nick Leeson.
